title: The Ark Of The Covenant - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/4/18
itunes:title: The Ark Of The Covenant - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/4/18
description:
George Noory and archeologist Jonathan Gray discuss the expedition to recover the Ark of the Covenant that may contain the remains of the Ten Commandments, and whether the discovery would prove that all stories in the Bible are true.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
